text: Monascus sanguineus is a fungal species in the family Elaphomycetaceae. It was found during a survey done on water and sediment of river Shatt al-Arab at Basra city, southern Iraq. The research was done by Basil Abbas under supervision of S.K. Abdullah in 1995. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Aquatic fungi Category:Eurotiales Category:Fungi described in 1995 Category:Fungi of Western Asia
title: Monascus sanguineus
